title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Educational Technology-Based Collaborative Learning Design and Open Educational Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate expertise in the relevant field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design educational materials with peers and experts using Web 2.0 tools (wikis, blogs, etc.).
Learners can develop and share Open Educational Resources (OER) within their professional contexts (medical/legal/technical).
Learners can analyze and improve educational technology application cases through online discussions and feedback mechanisms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
